channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: WatchGuard Firebox OS forced to patch worrying security flaw, so update now
item.description: The firewall maker found a critical RCE that is being abused in the wild.

item.title: Amazon prête James Bond à Netflix
item.description: Amazon est prêteur : le propriétaire du studio MGM autorise en effet Netflix à diffuser plusieurs films du catalogue, dont des James Bond récents et des séries qui, jusqu'à présents, étaient exclusives à Prime Video. Une démarche pragmatique et limitée dans le temps, mais qui confirme une tendance dans le milieu du streaming.

item.title: ‘It’ and ‘Black Phone’ Actor James Ransone Has Died at Age 46
item.description: Along with his genre roles in films like 'It: Chapter Two,' James Ransone was best remembered as Ziggy from 'The Wire.'

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Tuesday, December 23 (game #1429)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Tuesday, December 23 (game #926)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Tuesday, December 23 (game #660)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: Business lessons of 2026, from Airbnb, Meta, Linkedin, and more
item.description: Lessons from Airbnb’s Brian Chesky, Runway’s Cristóbal Valenzuela, Meta’s Clara Shih, LinkedIn’s Aneesh Raman, and other business leaders in interviews from the last year. This year delivered whiplash: geopolitics, tariffs, and technology all shifting at once. And heading into 2026, the disruption isn’t easing up. Bob Safian distills hard-won lessons from his Rapid Response podcast this year on how to lead when the ground won’t stop moving—featuring standout moments from Airbnb’s Brian Chesky, Runway’s Cristóbal Valenzuela, Meta’s Clara Shih, LinkedIn’s Aneesh Raman, Planned Parenthood’s Alexi...

item.title: Home prices are falling in these 98 housing markets
item.description: Among the 300 largest metro-area housing markets, these are the 98 with falling year-over-year home prices between November 2024 and November 2025. Want more housing market stories from Lance Lambert’s ResiClub in your inbox? Subscribe to the ResiClub newsletter.

item.title: This underrated Siri feature proves Apple can do AI – but the iPhone’s voice assistant still needs a drastic makeover in 2026
item.description: After noticing the subtle improvements made to Siri Suggestions, I'm convinced that Apple can bring meaningful AI upgrades to the iPhone in 2026.

item.title: Don't let battery anxiety spoil your holiday gadget fun – grab this lightning deal on the fastest power bank I've tested
item.description: Get a huge discount on this fast-charging Anker power bank with this limited-time Amazon deal.

item.title: ChatGPT n’est plus assez sympa ? OpenAI corrige l’IA face aux critiques des utilisateurs
item.description: ChatGPt-5.2 n'est pas parvenu à plaire à tout le monde. Pour certains internautes, la mise à jour a rendu l'IA beaucoup moins sympa qu'avant. Face aux critiques, OpenAI a décidé d'ajouter une option qui permet d'ajuster l'aspect chaleureux des réponses du chatbot.

item.title: Paramount has an updated Warner Bros. Discovery bid
item.description: Paramount Skydance isn't giving up on obtaining Warner Bros. Discovery just yet. The company has amended its $108 billion offer to include Larry Ellison's "irrevocable personal guarantee" equaling $40.4 billion. Ellison is the founder or Oracle and a backer of Skydance, created by his son David Ellison, Paramount Skydance's CEO. On December 17, WBD formally recommended shareholders reject Paramount's offer. WBD had already accepted an $82.7 billion offer from Netflix, set to close some time next year following regulatory approval. "[The board] has unanimously determined that the tender offer ...

item.title: The Doomsday Glacier Is Getting Closer and Closer to Irreversible Collapse
item.description: An analysis of the expansion of cracks in the Thwaites Glacier over the past 20 years suggests that a total collapse could be only a matter of time.

item.title: Elon Musk’s net worth skyrockets to $749 billion, following pay package ruling
item.description: According to Forbes’ billionaires list, Musk’s fortune now surpasses that of Google cofounder Larry Page, by almost $500 billion. Tesla CEO Elon Musk’s net worth surged to $749 billion late Friday after the Delaware Supreme Court reinstated Tesla stock options worth $139 billion that were voided last year, according to Forbes’ billionaires index.

item.title: Skyscanner Makes 2026 Soccer Travel Easy Across North America, Book Affordable Trips Between Host Cities
item.description: Use Skyscanner's Soccer Flight Finder and Soccer Travel Hub to find the best flight deals to all the host cities in the US, Canada, and Mexico.

item.title: Expedition 33 perd un GOTY pour avoir utilisé l’IA générative
item.description: À peine couronné par les plus grandes cérémonies vidéoludiques, Clair Obscur : Expedition 33 voit son triomphe terni. Le studio montpelliérain Sandfall Interactive s’est vu retirer ses prix de « jeu de l’année » et de « meilleur premier jeu » par les Indie Game Awards, après la révélation de l’usage, pourtant minime, d’une texture générée par intelligence artificielle. Une décision qui relance le débat brûlant sur la place de l’IA dans la création vidéoludique....

item.title: How the MetroCard became an icon of design
item.description: The golden-yellow tickets reshaped how New Yorkers accessed the subway and became civic icons in the process. With its goofy block lettering and bright colors, the MetroCard feels like a relic, which it sort of is—an early 1990s design, complete with gradients and drop shadows, that’s managed to stick around long enough to become one of New York’s defining symbols. At a time when generic minimalism and the sheen of AI-generated graphics have taken over, its unmistakable graphics feel refreshing. And the fact that a 31-year-old fare payment system is still in circulation when most tech today b...

item.title: Anthropic takes the fight to OpenAI with enterprise AI tools - and they're going open source too
item.description: Anthropic wants the industry to open-source Skills (packages of instructions for AI) so we can all benefit.

item.title: Trump’s new $900 billion Pentagon funding plan includes ‘enhanced cybersecurity protections’ for Cyber Command - here’s what we know
item.description: New defense bill includes significant provisions for cybersecurity and telecoms.

item.title: 3 things I won’t miss about remote work as RTO policies get stricter in 2026
item.description: Companies like Paramount and Microsoft are rolling out stricter RTO policies for 2026. Over the past five years, the remote work revolution has changed life as we know it for corporate folks like myself. And while I’m on the record singing the praises of working from home, I’d like to set the record straight: It’s not without its faults.

item.title: Taillé pour les titres AAA, ce laptop gaming HP surpuissant (RTX 5080 + Ultra 9) profite d’une remise de 1 075 €
item.description: Processeur puissant, carte graphique récente, écran bien fluide... Quand il s'agit de faire tourner les gros jeux, le HP Omen Max 16 s'en sort à merveille. La bonne nouvelle, c'est que ce PC portable gamer coûte 2 424,88 euros au lieu de 3 499 euros sur Amazon.

item.title: These were the best ads of 2025
item.description: Our unofficial awards for ads that broke through through the noise with some truly creative creative. It’s been a pretty wild year in the world of advertising and brand work.

item.title: Christopher Nolan’s First Teaser for ‘The Odyssey’ Is Here
item.description: Matt Damon and Tom Holland lead an all-star cast in the Homer adaptation, in theaters July 17, 2026.

item.title: TikTok Shop launches digital gift cards to challenge Amazon and eBay
item.description: TikTok Shop has rolled out a new feature that allows users to purchase digital gift cards, making it easier to help friends and family buy from the millions of products on the app.

item.title: What is the release date for Fallout season 2 episode 2 on Prime Video?
item.description: The second episode of Fallout's second season is almost here – this is when you can stream it.

item.title: Samsung ‘Wide Fold’ rumored to rival Apple’s foldable next year
item.description: Apple's long-rumored foldable iPhone is set to arrive next year, and already faces some preemptive competition from Samsung. Korea's ET News reports that Samsung's upcoming "Wide Fold" is also set to launch in 2026, and will closely mirror the display size and 4:3 aspect ratio of Apple's first foldable. The machine-translated report says the Wide […]...

item.title: Shock, horror! In-car touchscreens are way more distracting than we first thought, says new study
item.description: New research suggests that using a touchscreen when behind the wheel makes you a pretty terrible driver.

item.title: Mullvad VPN boosts WireGuard speeds and stability with new Rust-based engine
item.description: Mullvad VPN is swapping out its engine. The new "GotaTun" implementation, built with Rust, is already slashing app crashes and paving the way for a faster, WireGuard-only future.

item.title: ‘Avatar: Fire and Ash’ debuts, making $345 million globally in its opening weekend
item.description: In 2025, the only other film with such a lucrative debut was “Zootopia 2,” making $497.2 million in sales over three days. “Avatar: Fire and Ash” opened with $345 million in worldwide sales, according to studio estimates Sunday, notching the second-best global debut of the year and potentially putting James Cameron on course to set yet more blockbuster records.Sixteen years into the “Avatar” saga, Pandora is still abundant in box-office riches. “Fire and Ash,” the third film in Cameron’s science-fiction franchise, launched with $88 million domestically and $257 million internationally. The onl...

item.title: Exynos 2600 : Samsung dévoile sa puce 2 nm avant Apple
item.description: Après des mois de rumeurs, Samsung a fini par dévoiler la nouvelle puce maison qui équipera certains de ses smartphones haut de gamme : l'Exynos 2600. Et comme prévu, c'est la première du genre à être gravée en 2 nm, grillant ainsi la politesse à Apple.

item.title: Instacart is ending its controversial price tests
item.description: Instacart has announced it will be ending price testing on its platform. This comes after a study published earlier this month revealed pricing experiments that led to some customers seeing higher prices than others and the FTC saying last week it would be investigating the grocery delivery app. "Effective immediately, Instacart is ending all item price tests on our platform. Retailers will no longer be able to use Eversight technology to run item price tests on Instacart," an Instacart spokesperson shared with Engadget. The blog post called out "misconceptions and misinformation," maintaining...

item.title: Une première : l’alliance Google-Thalès du Cloud reçoit la plus haute certification de cybersécurité de l’État
item.description: Des technologies cloud américaines labellisées SecNumCloud 3.2, la plus haute certification de l'État français, c'est possible. Pour la première fois, une offre hybride (une technologie cloud américaine opérée par une entreprise française) portée par Thalès et Google Cloud a reçu le précieux sésame.

item.title: Don’t miss out again — the excellent Breville Barista Express is back to its Black Friday price on Amazon
item.description: The Breville Barista Express is one of the best coffee makers according to our experts – and it's available for a record-low price right now on Amazon.

item.title: Le OnePlus 15R est un smartphone facilement réparable
item.description: Le nouveau smartphone de OnePlus obtient un score de réparabilité de 8,5 sur 10. Une note qui pourrait séduire les acheteurs en quête d'un appareil premium et durable.

item.title: La Banque Postale est en panne : c’est confirmé une cyberattaque touche tous les services de la Poste
item.description: Après une première panne d'envergure samedi, la Banque Postale est à nouveau en panne ce lundi matin du 22 décembre. La banque en ligne n'est pas la seule touchée, les autres services de La Poste subissent de plein fouet une panne informatique.

item.title: It’s finally time to retire the word ‘podcast’
item.description: According to YouTube's 2025 Recap feature, the podcast I consumed the most on its platform was Seth Meyers' recurring segment "A Closer Look" on his show Late Night. Last year, I would have argued that this is not a podcast. That it is, in fact, a clip of a TV show. But in 2025, with […]
